message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $11,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $11,000?
Bob, I understand your desire to stay within budget, but the value of this product is undeniable. How about we meet in the middle at $11,250?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I'm hoping to keep my expenses lower. Could we perhaps agree on $11,000?
